means: 嵩雀类，食米鸟，秧鸡之一种

圃鹀（ortolan），另一道则是餐巾盖松露（truffe à la serviette）。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French, from Provençal, literally 'gardener', based on a diminutive of Latin hortus 'garden'

means.word_mean: 1. brownish Old World bunting often eaten as a delicacy
